name: Gravity on the Moon
description:
Arcade Racing game where you have to make it to the end before the song ends, while accumulating score.

The idea behind this game was to make game with the release of our album.

CONTROLS ActionKeyboardGamepad (ps/xbox)Cancel
ESC
O / B
AcceptEnter/space
X/A
AccelerateUp arrow
X or R2 / A or RT
BrakeDown arrow
[_] or L2 / X or LT
SteerLeft/right arrow
Left joystick
Camera-------Right Joystick
Respawn at checkpoint
RSelect / BackPauseESCStart Status

Currently there's only 1 completed level, my goal is to complete the next then start designing the rest of songs in the album. Also there ain't no failstates as of now.
